00026 atomic_t ScannerMap::ms_next_id = ATOMIC_INIT(0);
00027 
00031 uint32_t ScannerMap::put(CellListScannerPtr &scannerPtr, RangePtr &rangePtr) {
00032   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00033   ScanInfoT scanInfo;
00034   scanInfo.scannerPtr = scannerPtr;
00035   scanInfo.rangePtr = rangePtr;
00036   scanInfo.last_access = get_timestamp();
00037   uint32_t id = atomic_inc_return(&ms_next_id);
00038   m_scanner_map[id] = scanInfo;
00039   return id;
00040 }

00047 bool ScannerMap::get(uint32_t id, CellListScannerPtr &scannerPtr, RangePtr &rangePtr) {
00048   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00049   CellListScannerMapT::iterator iter = m_scanner_map.find(id);
00050   if (iter == m_scanner_map.end())
00051     return false;
00052   (*iter).second.last_access = get_timestamp();
00053   scannerPtr = (*iter).second.scannerPtr;
00054   rangePtr = (*iter).second.rangePtr;
00055   return true;
00056 }
00057 
00058 
00059 
00063 bool ScannerMap::remove(uint32_t id) {
00064   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00065   return (m_scanner_map.erase(id) == 0) ? false : true;
00066 }
00067 
00068 void ScannerMap::purge_expired(time_t expire_time) {
00069   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_mutex);
00070   time_t now = get_timestamp();
00071   CellListScannerMapT::iterator iter = m_scanner_map.begin();
00072 
00073   while (iter != m_scanner_map.end()) {
00074     if ((now - (*iter).second.last_access) > expire_time) {
00075       CellListScannerMapT::iterator tmp_iter = iter;
00076       HT_WARNF("Destroying scanner %d because it has not been used in %u seconds", (*iter).first, (uint32_t)expire_time);
00077       iter++;
00078       (*tmp_iter).second.scannerPtr = 0;
00079       (*tmp_iter).second.rangePtr = 0;
00080       m_scanner_map.erase(tmp_iter);
00081     }
00082     else
00083       iter++;
00084   }
00085 
00086 }
00087 
00088 
00089 time_t ScannerMap::get_timestamp() {
00090   boost::xtime now;
00091   boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00092   return (time_t)now.sec;
00093 }
